aboutPublic.changingDescription: The landscape of tomorrow is built by our actions today. GFP aims to accelerate the pace of change, by being the conduit between businesses, individuals and climate solutions. Our goal is to harness the power of collective action, connecting brands, organisations and consumers intent on contributing to a greener future.
aboutPublic.goalDescription: is to reverse the effects of climate change, preserving the planet for both current and future generations
aboutPublic.makingDescription: We want to prove that sustainability can be profitable. GFP supports businesses to partner with the worldâ€™s best climate projects, building a greater impact as you inspire your customers, and other industry players to follow.
aboutPublic.missionDescription: is to simplify access to effective climate solutions and empower you to have an active role in reversing climate change
aboutPublic.offsetDescription: The carbon offset generated by the climate solutions you support is certified by the highest verification standards, such as Gold Standard and Carbon Verra, or backed by extensive scientific research.
aboutPublic.protect: Why is it important to protect this {{value}}?
aboutPublic.responsibilityDescription: We are all on this planet together â€“ in order to preserve it for future generations, we must make sustainability the focus of our decisions and our actions. We all have a responsibility, and everyone deserves the chance to pitch in.
aboutPublic.restoreDescription: Our restoration and preservation projects find their home in some of the richest areas of biodiversity on the planet. By supporting these projects, you are protecting endangered species and ensuring the longevity of crucial ecosystems.
aboutPublic.simplifyDescription: Complex problems can seem impossible to solve â€“ we aim to simplify. Our goal is to provide clarity and transparency, highlighting the partners and processes involved in all GFPâ€™s climate solutions. Our subscriptions make it easy for you to track and understand your impact.
aboutPublic.solutionDescription:
We developed an innovative platform for you to track, trace, and visualize your impact in real-time.

Our interactive dashboard bridges you to the worldâ€™s best climate solutions through a gamified experience where you can learn, and engage with the projects you support.
aboutPublic.supportDescription: All the NGOs that we collaborate with work in close contact with local communities. By supporting these projects you are increasing fair employment rates and improving living conditions for local communities.
aboutPublic.title:
We bridge you to the best 
climate solutions
aboutPublic.visionDescription: is the continued acceleration of change, by harnessing the power of collective action

marineFirst.hotspot1: Stop worrying. Don't give up!🤗 You have mostly sand right now, with a few bleached coral patches and a few healthy corals rehomed on-site. Small fish🐟 and a lack of sea life.
marineFirst.hotspot2: Coral reefs provide an important ecosystem for life underwater, protect coastal areas by buffering shorelines against 97 percent of the energy from waves, and provide a crucial source of income for millions of people.
marineFirst.hotspot3: Coral species: staghorn coral (Acropora cervicornis); blue coral (Heliopora coerulea) ; Acroporta austere ; Sinularia brassica.
marineFirst.hotspot4: Marine fauna: lemon gamsel (Pomacentrus moluccensis); banded coral shrimp (Stenopus hispidus) ; hermit crab (Dardanus)
marineFirst.hotspot5: Coral reefs support more species per unit area than any other marine environment, including about 4,000 species of fish, 800 species of hard corals and hundreds of other species

marineSecond.hotspot1: You have an appointment with your forest!🌅 The sand seafloor has evolved since the first stage, with fewer bleached coral patches and more healthy corals.
marineSecond.hotspot2: Coral reefs provide an important ecosystem for life underwater, protect coastal areas by buffering shorelines against 97 percent of the energy from waves, and provide a crucial source of income for millions of people.
marineSecond.hotspot3: Coral reefs support more species per unit area than any other marine environment, including about 4,000 species of fish, 800 species of hard corals and hundreds of other species
marineSecond.hotspot4: Marine fauna: lemon gamsel (Pomacentrus moluccensis); banded coral shrimp (Stenopus hispidus) ; hermit crab (Dardanus)
marineSecond.hotspot5: Coral species: staghorn coral (Acropora cervicornis); blue coral (Heliopora coerulea) ; Acroporta austere ; Sinularia brassica;

marineThird.hotspot1: That is incredible!💥 The visibility of the seabed deteriorates. It's growing in size. The polyps are especially noticeable🐙.Smaller schools of fish are forming around the corals. You have turtles! 🐢
marineThird.hotspot2: Coral reefs provide an important ecosystem for life underwater, protect coastal areas by buffering shorelines against 97 percent of the energy from waves, and provide a crucial source of income for millions of people.
marineThird.hotspot3: Coral reefs support more species per unit area than any other marine environment, including about 4,000 species of fish, 800 species of hard corals and hundreds of other species
marineThird.hotspot4: Marine fauna: lemon gamsel (Pomacentrus moluccensis); banded coral shrimp (Stenopus hispidus) ; hermit crab (Dardanus)blue chromis (Chromis cyanea); green sea turtle (Cheloniamydas); blacktip shark (Carcharhinus limbatus); black sea cucumber (Holothuria atra).

marineFourth.hotspot1: WHATğŸ‘AğŸ‘GREATğŸ‘GAME!. The reef has been completely rebuilt and is now rising. Increase of colourful fish swimming close to the coralsğŸ . Sharks have joined the mix!ğŸ¦ˆ
marineFourth.hotspot2: Coral reefs provide an important ecosystem for life underwater, protect coastal areas by buffering shorelines against 97 percent of the energy from waves, and provide a crucial source of income for millions of people.
marineFourth.hotspot3: Coral reefs support more species per unit area than any other marine environment, including about 4,000 species of fish, 800 species of hard corals and hundreds of other species
marineFourth.hotspot4: Marine fauna: lemon gamsel (Pomacentrus moluccensis); banded coral shrimp (Stenopus hispidus); hermit crab (Dardanus) blue chromis (Chromis cyanea); green sea turtle (Chelonia mydas); blacktip shark (Carcharhinus limbatus); black sea cucumber (Holothuria atra).

preservationFirst.hotspot1: According to the FAO protecting forests is essential to slow down climate change as they contain just over half of the carbon residing in terrestrial vegetation and soil, amounting to 1200 Gt of carbon.
preservationFirst.hotspot2: One Acre of Amazon rainforest can store approximately 49 tonnes of CO2

preservationSecond.hotspot1: You are now protecting a bigger forest and biodiversity has increased
preservationSecond.hotspot2: According to the FAO protecting forests is essential to slow down climate change as they contain just over half of the carbon residing in terrestrial vegetation and soil, amounting to 1200 Gt of carbon.
preservationSecond.hotspot3: One Acre of Amazon rainforest can store approximately 49 tonnes of CO2

projectDetails.inviteAFriendCopy:
Want to plant 10 trees for free?
Use code {{value}} to join Green Future Project!
Start your climate journey at https://cutt.ly/wK9mydK
projectDetails.popUpCO2:
Flight: A passenger flying one-way Economy from Rome to NYC will emit 1,027kg of CO2. This means that for every km flown we emit 0,15119kg CO2.

Next flight: We have included the percentage of your next â€˜Rome-NYCâ€™ flight that is being offset.
projectDetails.popUpTrees:
Tennis court: The size of a tennis court is 264m2. Trees are planted 1,5 meters apart. This means that it takes 173 trees to fill up 1 tennis court. The size of an acre is 4,046m2. This means that it takes 16 tennis courts to fill 1 acre. 

Next Court: We have included the percentage of your next tennis court that is being filled.
projectDetails.popUpAcres:
The size of an acre is 4,046m2. This means that it takes 16 tennis courts to fill 1 acre.

Next Court: We have included the percentage of your next tennis court that is being filled.

projectType.projects: Check out the rest of the projects

projects.notSupporting: Projects you are not supporting yet

renewableFirst.hotspot1: Keep up the good work! You've already powered 1 house for 1 year! (3.7 MWH)

renewableSecond.hotspot1: Clearing skies and a gentle breeze!🌤 You've powered 5 houses for 1 year, that's a mini neighbourhood! (7.4MWH)

restorationFirst.hotspot2: Your newly planted forest is populated by pollinators such as butterflies, bats, bees and moths.
restorationFirst.hotspot3: Your newly planted forest is populated by small animals like mudflat filter crab (Uca rapax) and rainbow parrotfish larvae (Scarus guamacaia)
restorationFirst.hotspot4: Mangroves are a key part of coastal ecosystems, renowned for supporting fisheries, sediment regulation, and even helping to protect against storms and tsunamis.

restorationFourth.hotspot1: Wow! A mature forest with a high level of biodiversity - watch out you've also attracted alpha predators!🦁
restorationFourth.hotspot2: You mangrove forest is now strong and healthy. It is home to an immense diversity of flora and fauna. The restoration of this coastal land will protect local communities against storms and tsunamis for generations to come.
restorationFourth.hotspot3: Your mangrove forest is now abundant in giant barracuda, mangrove snapper, jacks, trevally, grouper, stingrays, and various other fish
restorationFourth.hotspot4: Your mangrove is now populated by numerous alpha predators such as young lemon sharks (Negaprion brevirostris), striated heron (Butorides striata) manatees and dugongs ; alligators and crocodiles.

restorationSecond.hotspot1: Your mangrove forest is now rich in shrimp, crab, and shellfish and provides habitat to a variety of birdlife.
restorationSecond.hotspot2: Your mangrove trees have elongated stems, deeper roots and a greater number of leaves
restorationSecond.hotspot3: Mangroves are one of the most effective tools for offsetting carbon emissions. For each mangrove tree that is planted  over 308kg of CO2 are removed from the atmosphere during its lifetime â€“ an average of 12.3kg per year.
restorationSecond.hotspot4: Mangroves are a key part of coastal ecosystems, renowned for supporting fisheries, sediment regulation, and even helping to protect against storms and tsunamis.
restorationSecond.hotspot5: Your forest is populated by a greater variety of animal such as rainbow parrotfish juvenile (Scarus guamacaia) and goliath grouper juvenile (Epinephelus itajara);  juvenile mangrove snapper (Lutjanus griseus); brown pelican (Pelecanus occidentalis); white ibis (Eudocimus albus).
restorationSecond.hotspot6: Your ecosystem is attracting flora and fauna, take a look at it.

restorationThird.hotspot1: Your Mangroves trees are now growing into a healthy forest that will better protect local communities against storms and tsunamis.
restorationThird.hotspot2: Your mangrove trees have branches, much deeper roots and a copious number of leaves.
restorationThird.hotspot3: Mangroves are one of the most effective tools for offsetting carbon emissions. For each mangrove tree that is planted over 308kg of CO2 are removed from the atmosphere during its lifetime â€“ an average of 12.3kg per year.
restorationThird.hotspot4: Mangroves are a key part of coastal ecosystems, renowned for supporting fisheries, sediment regulation, and even helping to protect against storms and tsunamis.
restorationThird.hotspot5: Your forest is populated by a greater variety of animal such as rainbow parrotfish juvenile (Scarus guamacaia) and goliath grouper juvenile (Epinephelus itajara); juvenile mangrove snapper (Lutjanus griseus); brown pelican (Pelecanus occidentalis); white ibis (Eudocimus albus).
restorationThird.hotspot6: Your forest has more trees and biodiversity is increased! 🌳

welcomeOnBoard.title: Welcome onboard GFP!
welcomeOnBoard.partOfGFP:
Company name is now part of the 
Green Future Project
welcomeOnBoard.allowYourFriends: Allow your friends to join you on your environmental journey.
welcomeOnBoard.shareYourGFP: Share your GFP subscription and related climate projects.
welcomeOnBoard.shareWithEmployees: Share the impact of your subscription with the employees youâ€™ve chosen. Show them your GFP dashboard and the specifics of your project.
welcomeOnBoard.description: Thank you for being awesome and helping save the planet!

yourImpact.byProducing: By producing {{value}} Kw/h of clean energy
yourImpact.infoBody:
GFP lets you offset your carbon footprint by funding projects that remove or prevent CO2 emissions elsewhere. 

 The project's CO2 offset is either certified by third parties (Gold Standard, Carbon Verra or Invest Conservation) or backed by scientific research
yourImpact.certifiedBody: Every tonne of CO2 offset in this section is certified by either of Gold Standard, Carbon Verra, or Invest Conservation.
yourImpact.scienceBody:
We decided to go beyond the carbon credit scheme and show you the CO2 offset generated by our science-backed solutions (e.g. tree planting and preservation initiatives). 
In other words, your monthly subscription will be worth more CO2 offsets than what you are paying for. It is our way of saying thank you!
yourImpact.flightsBody:
You contribute 1,027kg of CO2 when flying economy from Rome to NY? 
Embark on our zero-carbon journey to make your impact fly high!
yourImpact.tennisTitle: Did you know a tennis court is 264m2 large?
yourImpact.tennisBody:
The ball's in your court. 
Are you ready to reforest lots of tennis courts worth of land with us?
yourImpact.householdsTitle: Did you know an average European house consumes 3.7MWh of energy per year?
yourImpact.householdsBody: Supercharge your clean power production to make more homes zero-carbon!

whyJoin.title: Enable your company to create impact at scale
whyJoin.description: Become a part of a powerful business Community
whyJoin.link: Book a call with our team
whyJoin.cardDescription1: Compensate your companyâ€™s emissions and employees' footprint
whyJoin.cardDescription2: Track and share the impact you are making by downloading our comprehensive reports
whyJoin.cardDescription3: Share your project assets and positive impact with stakeholders - our Integration Tool connects directly to your website
whyJoin.cardDescription4: Educate, and cultivate a sustainability culture throughout your company
whyJoin.whyShouldBusiness: Why should your business join GFP?
whyJoin.progress1: Choose the subscription that best suits your business needs
whyJoin.progress2: Get access to our database of scientific and certified climate projects
whyJoin.progress3: Streamline your impact and gather all your data in one place
whyJoin.progress4: Use GFPâ€™s Data Integration Tool to view and share your impact
whyJoin.getDescription1: Access to a personalized dashboard where you can track the impact you are making  and learn about the projects you are supporting.
whyJoin.getDescription2: A widget for you to integrate the counters of the real time impact you are making on your own website.
whyJoin.getDescription3: Get updates and access to photos and videos of the projects to share with your clients and stakeholders.
whyJoin.getDescription4: Receive personalised reports of your monthly impact sent directly to your inbox. You can download them through your dashboard.
whyJoin.apiDescription:
Through our API technology, GFP seamlessly integrates your positive impact into your products and services. 
Check out our Data Integration options and tools.
whyJoin.join: Are you ready to join GFP?
whyJoin.joinDescription: Set the new standards and be a leader in your industry!
whyJoin.serviceDescription1: Our marketing team provides bespoke marketing strategies by curating the campaigns your companyâ€™s needs to: raise environmental consciousness, boost brand value, and increase consumer loyalty and engagement.
whyJoin.serviceDescription2: With our partners Pilio Group, University of Oxford Environmental Change Institute, we provide you with 360 insight on your footprint and help you commit to a more sustainable governance strategy.

apiIntegration.title: API: One technology to connect them all
apiIntegration.description: Show the world the impact you are making by integrating your climate counters on your website.
apiIntegration.progressDataTitle: How to activate Data integration Tool
apiIntegration.progressData2: Log on to you Personalized Dashboard
apiIntegration.progressData3: Go to your notification board and follow the steps
apiIntegration.progressData4: Integrate your impact data on your website!
apiIntegration.progressClimateTitle: How to activate Climate Pioneer Integration
apiIntegration.progressClimate1: Select the climate pioneer subscription plan
apiIntegration.progressClimate2: Choose Revenue % Model or Tree per Item Model
apiIntegration.progressClimate4: Select your CMS and authenticate the integration
apiIntegration.stepDescription1:
Our GFP plugin seamlessly integrates your real-time impact data on your companyâ€™s website.
You will be able to show the world the total number of trees planted, acres protected, CO2 removed and renewable energy generated, all in one GFP branded widget.
apiIntegration.stepDescription2:
For our Climate Pioneers only - automatically plant trees for every item sold or choose to allocate a % of your revenue.
 
Our GFP integration is a simple and easy-to-use way for you to automate the purchase of trees directly from your e-commerce or application.
 
We have plugins for Shopify, Woo-Commerce, Magento and WordPress, allowing you to fund reforestation projects automatically for every sale you make.
apiIntegration.joinDescription: Set the new standards and be a leader in your industry!

mainSubscriptions.individual: Our subscriptions are designed to offset the total carbon footprint* of your lifestyle.
mainSubscriptions.business: Our plans enable your business to take climate action
mainSubscriptions.individualDescription: *The annual carbon footprint of an average European citizen is 6.4 tons of CO2. This includes food, energy consumption, transportation and more.
mainSubscriptions.businessDescription: Personalise your plan based on your business needs. Our subscriptions are tailored to match your business model and simplify your ESG objectives.
mainSubscriptions.ourIndividualSubscriptions: All of our individual subscriptions include:
mainSubscriptions.personalizedDashboard: Access a personalised dashboard to visualise and track your climate action in real time
mainSubscriptions.infographicAnalitycal: Receive your climate action infographic and analytical report in your inbox
mainSubscriptions.gfpIntegration: Use GFPâ€™s Impact Card to share your climate action on socials and inspire your family and friends!
mainSubscriptions.ourBusinessSubscriptions: All of our business subscriptions include:
mainSubscriptions.personalizedDashboardBusiness: Personalised dashboard to track and trace your companyâ€™s impact
mainSubscriptions.infographicAnalitycalBusiness: Infographic and analytical reports of your monthly impact sent directly to your inbox
mainSubscriptions.gfpIntegrationBusiness: GFP Integration tool to share your impact directly on your own website or platforms
mainSubscriptions.previewClimateLeader: Get a preview of your Climate Positive subscription
mainSubscriptions.pickTheDonation: Pick the donation model that suits you best
mainSubscriptions.chooseTheModel: Choose the model that works best with your business needs
mainSubscriptions.revenuePercentageModelDescription: Donate a percentage of your monthly turnover to plant trees and protect forests.
mainSubscriptions.treePerItemModelDescription:
Plant a set amount of trees for each item you sell.
For every tree planted, 1.156 m2 of rainforest are protected.

business.automaticallyDescription: Use our API integration to seamlessly connect your data directly from your CMS.  As soon as your CMS is connected to GFPâ€™s portal youâ€™ll be able to view your impact and tree planting in real time!
business.automaticallyInfo: By choosing this option we can only show you an estimate of your monthly cost based on the information you have inserted above. The actual cost will be obtained based on the data retrieved through your CMS.
business.manuallyDescription:
You will have to send your data each month through the GFP dashboard.
The first payment is based on the information inserted above.

homepagePopup.title: Join our community
homepagePopup.subtitle: We plant a tree for every sign up!
homepagePopup.description: We found a way to let YOU help stop climate change. Sign up to GFP's monthly newsletter to learn more.

calendlyPopup.title: Talk to us!
calendlyPopup.subtitle: Schedule a call with our team of climate experts!
calendlyPopup.description: Learn more about the benefits of investing in climate action.

faq.mainFaqDescription: Check out the FAQs below and don't hesitate to contact us if you still need assistance.
faq.formDescription: Drop us an email and weâ€™ll get back to you as soon as we can!
faq.mockDescription: To achieve the highest standard of sustainability and optimize the efficiency of donations, 60% of your contributions are dedicated to reforestation, ecosystems preservation and marine protection, whilst an estimated 20% are used to support clean and renewable energy projects. The remaining 20% is used to cover operating costs and spreading the word.
